alert.note: Alert for Manua; Rose Atoll; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued September 20 at 11:06AM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...A WIND ADVISORY IS IN EFFECT THROUGH SATURDAY... * Breezy trades of 20 to 30 mph with higher gusts will impact all islands of American Samoa through Saturday. * TIMING...through Saturday. FAUTUAGA MO SAVILI MALOLOSI OFISA O LE TAU PAGO PAGO AS 1105 TAEAO ASO LULU SETEMA 20 2023 ...O LOO TUMAU FAUTUAGA MO SAVILI MALOLOSI SEIA OO I LE ASO TOONA`I... * O savili o le tuaoloa e 20 i le 30 mph ma e agi fa`ata`uta`u i taimi o le a fa`apea ona a`afia ai motu uma a Amerika Samoa e oo atu i le Aso Toona`i. * TAIMI...seia oo i le Aso Toona`i. * AAFIAGA...E pau`u ai laau, lelea mea totino e le`i faamaumauina ma faaleagaina ai apa ma taualuga o fale. Savili malolosi e mafai ona faafaigata ai ona faafoe taavale, ae maise lava taavale maualuluga. E sousou fo`i le sami ona o le malolosi o savili. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O le uiga o le fautuaga mo savili malolosi o savili e 30 i le 39 mph ma malolosi atu i taimi e agi fa`ata`uta`u ai o le a aafia ai pea le atunuu. O nei savili e malolosi atu i nofoaga maualuluga. O le a faafaigata ai fo`i ona faafoe taavale i luga o le auala tele, ae maise taavale tetele ma le maualuluga. Ia faautagia mai lenei fautuaga.
info.instruction: A wind advisory means that winds of 35 MPH are expected. Winds This strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Rose Atoll; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
